title: The 50 best Amazon Black Friday deals still available today
description: We have the 50 best Amazon Black Friday deals still available on TVs, AirPods, robot vacuums, tablets and more.

title: Patch Google Chrome now to fix this emergency security flaw
description: Google Chrome patches high-severity zero-day vulnerability relating to a "heap buffer" overflow.

title: 11 best Black Friday TV deals extended - 4K, QLED and OLED TVs still on sale
description: We have the best Black Friday TV deals still available on 4K, QLED and OLED TVs with prices starting at just $79.99.

title: One of our favorite productivity laptops is heavily discounted this Black Friday
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 models are as much as 60% for Black Friday.

title: AMD leak provides a glimpse of other incoming RDNA 3 GPUs – but don’t get carried away
description: New leak shows the core counts of the Navi 32 and 33 GPUs, but let’s proceed with some skepticism and caution.

title: Drop everything: Apple MacBook Air M1 Cyber Monday deal is the cheapest we've ever seen
description: This is the lowest price we've ever seen for the M1 model of Apple's finest laptop.

title: Cyber Monday 2022 has started at Amazon - see all this weekend's best deals
description: We're kicking off our Cyber Monday 2022 coverage early this year with our favorite hold-out deals from Black Friday, news, and everything to expect.

title: The iPhone 15 Pro could get solid-state volume and power buttons
description: Another source now says that Apple is going to use haptic technology in place of buttons on the pricier 2023 iPhones.

title: Windows 11 gaming bug has been cured – but not for everyone
description: This is a nasty bug that causes stuttering frame rates, but Microsoft still needs to implement an actual full fix.
